attributes.action: remove the word 'Royal' from the name of Royal Mail Holdings plc in view of the organization's poor service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK's national mail service is a joke, and it is time for this to be reflected in the name of Royal Mail Holdings plc. The word 'Royal' should only be bestowed on an organization that offers a premium service - one that the Royal Mail has failed to offer in recent years.
